channel.title: Suggestions for Moparscape forums
channel.description:
Pretty sure been suggested before but re-suggesting as these are worth it.
Add the following
-Spoiler Tag -facepalm Smiley -Youtube auto embedder -New Theme
[b]Reasons[/b]
-Spoiler tags could be used in development threads to help shorten the media and to help organize "advanced" information that only select few people will really and truly read.
-Facepalm smiley is just needed badly nothing more to say....look at server downloads...
-Youtube auto embedder could be used in developments as well as you can embed videos directly. This means having to use less memory on your computer as it rips the movie directly instead of having to open up a new tab/browser window.
-New Theme(s), personally I would love this. Not everybody likes the lighter color themes i would love to see like a black and blue or a black and green theme. ;) Anything dark lol...if you are worried about tastes could give us the power to select the theme ourselves.
-Love

item.title: Suggestions for Moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

If he is referring to the Mystic Jade theme, I don’t support the adding of that. That theme is used too much for SMF.

The SMF curve/default theme is used to much as well, yet we still use it. I don’t think it’s about how much the theme is used.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions for Moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Loveandpower:

@Tom - Why give criticism to a person who just 100% leeched a server and trying to steal credits fro it. When I see an original server I do give criticism and tell what could be improved.

So they can take on board that criticism? What exactly does turning up onto a thread and being horrible to someone gain you as a person? You don’t know anything about them, they could have no idea what they’ve done but you jumped the gun and assume they’re an idiot who can’t read.

Everyone has had something they’ve been bad at, or done something wrong they weren’t aware off. How does abusing them in order to make yourself look like the higher authority help anyone? And anyway a facepalm function would just lower the quality of posts even further.

LilXCj:

http://www.dzinerstudio.com/index.php?action=downloads;sa=view;down=105

Yeah, that is a nice theme and I support the adding off it. All the themes related to mopar seem to be light colours, it would be nice for a change.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions for Moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I don’t agree with the facepalm smiley, at all. It would just create a ton of fights and more spam. There really isn’t any real need for it as far as I can see? People just want to use it to look cool. In regards to the spoiler tags I don’t see why not but there should be a limit on how many you can use in a post.

I also think links are fine for youtube videos

-Facepalm smiley is just needed badly nothing more to say....look at server downloads...

Why do you NEED to face palm at peoples work? Why not give them constructive criticism instead of attacking them.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions for Moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

#1, 2 I like.

I really want the facepalm smiley, it would help me vent more instead of raging, it’s like a vicious cycle.

Me: ‘Encounters idiot’
Idiot: ‘Idiot says something stupid’
Me: ‘Rage’
Me: ‘Post moderation’

With facepalm smiley:

Me: ‘Encounters idiot’
Idiot: ‘Idiot says something stupid’
Me: ‘Face palm smiley’
Idiot: ‘Rage’

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions for Moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I don’t care much for the spoiler tags, he can add them if he wants to.

The face-palm smilie would be fine I suppose, people would find a way around the mod or anti-spam measure to spam the thing though, I’m sure.

I don’t care to be honest, people would end up taking advantage of the fact on how many videos would be allowed to be posted in each posts.

Sure, depending on the theme though, I’m tired of seeing over-used stuff, so I suppose MoparScape members should help put together a custom theme for MoparScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions for Moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

if there was a real reason why spoilers wasn’t used only one I could think of is people misusing it to make several spoilers within each other. There are a couple of spoiler mods out there that are hover spoilers. Meaning that you can only put one inside as far as I know.

There are anti smiley spam bots out there as well that could be used to prevent spam.

Valid argument for #3 I guess even though on dial up as I do use that sometimes I have experienced that isn’t the embedding that slows down the pages but the large amount of images. Embedded videos normally don’t lag me unless I click on it for it to start.

I hope he will for #4

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions for Moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I never understood why we don’t have spoilers, but I’m guessing mopar has a reason

But I doubt a facepalm smiley will get accepted… its just going to increase the amount of spam here

The Youtube thing was suggested already I think, links were fine because otherwise it makes it harder for people on bad connections to load pages

MITB said he will install new themes if people want them

Read full topic
